document.full_text: a long-awaited memoir by british rock guitarist and the who songwriter pete townshend will be finished and published by next year, book publisher harper collins said on tuesday.
document.title: pete townshend says 2012 memoir a "rite of passage"
lines_and_colors: a long-awaited memoir by british rock guitarist and the who songwriter pete townshend will be finished and published by next year, book publisher harper collins said on tuesday.
